subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt is likable, as playful as he is fast. His speed is breathtaking. But when I want to fully believe, I feel a twinge of skepticism.
snippet: Usain Bolt is likable, as playful as he is fast. His speed is breathtaking. But when I want to fully believe, I feel a twinge of skepticism.
